description.raw:
This is the first of a series of cleanup changes.  These changes all involve either cleaning up the code, improving the test coverage, or both.  Some of the PRs are going to be large, and some small; I've tried to break it down to make it more digestible, but please let me know if I should break them down further.

* Start branch element-coverage-cleanup

* Sort header file includes in Element.

* Add in a new Element::Get method.

    This one is a little bit easier to use in that it returns
    just a boolean, and the value is stuffed into _param, a
    reference.  This comes out of the discussion here:
    #!/osrf/sdformat/pull-requests/333 .

    While I was in here, I ended up sharing more of the logic
    for ::Get so we have less duplicated code.  I also added
    tests for all of this.

* Remove the unimplemented PrintWiki method prototypes.

* Do a cleanup on all of Element.hh doxygen comments.

    It now at least has reasonable comments for everything.

* Add more tests to Element.cc.

    Along with this, combine some common code that was separated
    before.
